Hi all,

I'd like to share this project with the group members. It's an ope=
n
source search engine that was built on top of Heritrix and Solr. The
name=
 of the project is YouSeer and it's part of the general SeerSuite  
<https:=
//sourceforge.net/projects/citeseerx/> framework that powers both
CiteSeerx=
 <http://citeseerx.ist.psu.edu/>   and ChemxSeer 
<http://chemxseer.ist.psu=
.edu/> .
It's realeased under Apache License version 2.0.

The sourcecode a=
nd a VM image that has the system installed and running
are available on So=
urceForge:
http://youseer.sourceforge.net/

Hope this will help users who a=
re interested in integrating Heritrix
with Solr.
